mapper.insert: INSERT INTO movie_detail_kf_api ( DOCID, movieSeq, title, titleOrg, directorNm, actorNm, nation, company, plot, runtime, rating, genre, keywords, repRlsDate, posters, codeNo, teasers, stlls ) VALUES ( #{DOCID, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{movieSeq, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{title, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{titleOrg, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{directorNm, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{actorNm, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{nation, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{company, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{plot, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{runtime, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rating, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{genre, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{keywords, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{repRlsDate, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{posters, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{codeNo, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{teasers, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{stlls, jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
